headline: IDEX (NYSE:IEX) Surprises With Q1 Sales
summary: Manufacturing company IDEX (NYSE:IEX) reported revenue ahead of Wall Street’s expectations in Q1 CY2025, with sales up 1.7% year on year to $814.3 million. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.75 per share was 6.7% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

raw.headline: IDEX (NYSE:IEX) Surprises With Q1 Sales

headline: IDEX tops quarterly estimates on demand for health and science products
summary: Industrial equipment maker IDEX Corp on Thursday beat Wall Street estimates for first-quarter profit and revenue, driven by a sustained recovery in the demand for its health and science-related products. Demand for such products has been rising as sellers continue to restock their inventory after a prolonged period of drawdowns caused by large stockpiles accumulated during the COVID-19 pandemic. Sales at IDEX's health and sciences technology segment, which makes components used in clinical diagnostics, drug discovery, food-processing industry, among others, rose 10% from a year ago.

headline: Idex: Q1 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The results topped Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of five analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $1.64 per share. The maker of the Jaws of Life device and other engineered products posted revenue of $814.3 million in the period, which also beat Street forecasts.

headline: IDEX Reports First Quarter Results
summary: NORTHBROOK, Ill., May 01, 2025--IDEX Corporation (NYSE: IEX) today announced its financial results for the three-month period ended March 31, 2025.
